m_szDocTitle: Hyundai ix35 used for world’s first fuel cell-powered car-sharing service
m_szDocSumamry: Hyundai ix35 used for world’s first fuel cell-powered car-sharing service 2 pictures BeeZero has launched in Munich, Germany, using 50 of the ix35 FCEVs, which can be booked online or via a mobile app                                                      (Credit: Hyundai). View gallery (2 images) Hyundai has followed news of its IONIQ line of electrified vehicles and roadmap for connected car development with an announcement that its cars will power the "world's first" fuel cell-powered zero-emission car-sharing service. BeeZero has launched exclusively using Hyundai ix35 vehicles. Hyundai desc
